channel.title: LAV-25/Abrams questions/suggestions
channel.description:
Hello again Black Mesa,
There were two things I would like to know about the HECU vehicles, one about the LAV-25, and another about the abrams. If these features aren't present, they will pose as suggestions.
I've read on the BMS wikia that the M1 Abrams will be capable of moving around. While I think that is an awesome feature, I wish to know if the LAV will do the same thing. The fact that there is enough space for it to move around in surface tension certainly implies it. Plus it will be a cool idea to have an LAV advances alongside the infantry as it provides supressive fire.
As for the M1 Abrams, I saw the video where its turret rotates. Will the tank also be capable of pivoting its barrel vertically? I ask because if it only rotates on a horizontial axis, it will be easy to exploit if the player manages to gain the high ground.
A while ago, I asked if the Humvee was going to be a driveable vehicle (Thanks for the response Raminator). Although I have rigged vehicles to be driveable before, modifying a model that already has some of these features is a different story, because then you'll have to fix what was broken in the whole reverse engineering procedure (which is usually alot). Plus developers frown upon their work being modified, so making these changes myself in the event the mod's released seems out of the question.
I'm still confident you guys will finish the mod, so I hope you'll fill me in on that, then I'll know what to expect.
(I also read that the LAV can't transport troops. I don't know how you'll pull that off, but I'll leave that to your creativity).

item.title: LAV-25/Abrams questions/suggestions
item.dc:creator: BahamutBBob
item.description:
^^

xalener:

who expected scary?
Who watched movie for scary?

I expected to see the monster more. That’s pretty much all I was expecting, and I was very disappointed with everything after The Brooklyn Bridge. Well, aside from the few scenes where the monster was busy being badass.

Read full topic

item.title: LAV-25/Abrams questions/suggestions
item.dc:creator: OrderOfDagon
item.description:
Raminator:

There’s a sequence in Surface Tension where an LAV lays down suppressing fire for hgrunts running alongside it.

Sounds fucking sexy – a lot like that scene from Cloverfield.

Read full topic

item.title: LAV-25/Abrams questions/suggestions
item.dc:creator: Joe_Freeman
item.description:
Mr. Someguy:

They won’t.

While the LAV IRL can carry a group of 4 Armed Soldiers, the LAV in Black Mesa won’t be used for transport at all.

Shame, I’m still going to miss that scene in Surface Tension where the IFV bursts through the wall and offloads 2 more Soldiers. It was one of my favourites

You can still recreate that scene. The LAV crashes into the garage, and soldiers enter by foot. It’s almost the same.

Read full topic

Yes

item.dc:creator: DEATH_eVADER
item.description:
calhoun freeman:

Hope not, moving M1s already sound terrifying.

Just put on you Fedora, grab the nearest horse, and block the barrel with a nice rock

item.title: LAV-25/Abrams questions/suggestions
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
Maybe if we’re lucky, they’ll still have it in.

Just have the APC drive through the wall, back up, and the grunts run through.

Or alternatively, have the APC drive all the way in and join the fight, with the Grunts following.

Read full topic

item.title: LAV-25/Abrams questions/suggestions
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Yup- adding anims to a model is a real bitch in Source. Wish there was a way to bake them in without having to recompile so often- having an animation in the set that doesn’t work would take a whole decomp and recomp cycle to fix. I’m thinking about adding animations to blackout.mdl to make a shaky camera for my mod- it’s a pain in the ass to be sure.

Read full topic

item.title: LAV-25/Abrams questions/suggestions
item.dc:creator: calhoun_freeman
item.description:
Turning on Source SDK to make fans think that the devs are working on the mod while they go out, see a movie and get drunk having fun.

Read full topic

item.title: LAV-25/Abrams questions/suggestions
item.dc:creator: xalener
item.description:
What still counts as a great expenditure of effort at this point?

Read full topic

item.title: LAV-25/Abrams questions/suggestions
item.dc:creator: Mr_Someguy
item.description:
Imo it’d be really simple to make an IFV that offloads grunts in a scripted sequence.

Just use the same method of offloading that the Combine Drop Containers use, but maybe with a different animation showing where they just hop out instead of a running jump.

The biggest problem with that is that’d need an IFV Model with a rear door that opens, I don’t think the one that have does that.

Oh right, and the animations for the grunts getting out too.

Read full topic

item.title: LAV-25/Abrams questions/suggestions
item.dc:creator: Dark_Signal
item.description:
Alright, Fantastic!

Mr. Someguy:

They won’t.

While the LAV IRL can carry a group of 4 Armed Soldiers, the LAV in Black Mesa won’t be used for transport at all.

Shame, I’m still going to miss that scene in Surface Tension where the IFV bursts through the wall and offloads 2 more Soldiers. It was one of my favourites

Yeah I kind of mispoke there. Although it would be nice to see the LAV be used as a ground transport, I’m pretty sure the developers can easily work around that. With cinematic physics available, chances are you’ll have to fight the LAV that will make a grand entrance instead.

Read full topic

item.description:
Too bad Marines have only one way to break down walls

Read full topic
